attacks.name: Bear Hug
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Double Impact
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 100 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Big Throw-GX
attacks.text: Discard your opponent's Active Pokémon and all cards attached to it. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
